data.Name: The Great Divide
data.Bio: There are four bands called The Great Divide: one from Paris, France (1), one from Stillwater, Oklahoma, US (2) one from London, UK (3) and one from Melbourne, Australia. (1) The Great Divide is a 5 piece hardcore band from Paris, France. The bands music is the right mix between faith in modern hardcore music, musical talent and an open mind. The music that results from this mix is full of energy, melody, emotion and catchy vibes. In a time when the greatest combos have split up Read more on Last.fm
